definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Purple garlic of Ying county is famous with its quality.

sentences.english: The stronger the taste of the garlic, the more sulfur content it has and therefore the greater are the medicinal benefits.

sentences.english: This paper mainly studied the color-preserving and deodorization in the processing of garlic products.

sentences.english: Freeze-drying technique adopted for producing high quality garlic powder was studied.

sentences.english: The longer treated time was, the weaker plants were. (4) Garlic could bolt earlier with low temperature treatment.
